summary: Just a funny little joke mod I made a while ago, decided to upload it. I know, the textures are bad, that\'s on purpose. Skittles can be found in the Riverwood Inn.
descriptionHtml:
Just a funny little joke mod I made a while ago, decided to upload it. I know, the textures are bad, that\'s on purpose. Skittles can be found in the Riverwood Inn.

If you like this mod, please endorse!

My other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks, enjoy the Nexus!
author: billmineface
